column4: how do i get to the command line so i can type in this sudo stuff?
I updated to the newest nvidia driver, and after a reboot it wont load kdm unless i go into dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg  and choose Vesa
i know thats lame but hey, super new
you can use a terminal, or hit ctrl-alt-f1
maddesh: f1 here. maybe kubuntu is different
so i'm in the right place i think
